inclusion.criterion: Recruitment via direct contact from patient population
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Randomization to use estrogen cream or placebo
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: New diagnosis of any conditions that are reactions/adverse events occur from the use of Estrace or placebo
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Lack of compliance with study procedures
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has history of acne and mild hirsutism, elevated testosterone levels, and recent enlargement of hands and feet. She is on stable doses of octreotide LAR.
